author: Basically Homeless
description:
In this video I attempt to beat the first place, world-wide, all-time high score in the most popular FPS aim trainer.  This accentuates the issue of cheat detection, and proves that my cyborg neuromuscular chrome is the end of competitive FPS games as we know them. 

MASSIVE shoutout to Even Realities for making this project possible. Check out the Even G2 and R1, the world's first everyday display smart glasses. From real-time Conversate and notifications to your personal Even AI assistant, they’ve reimagined what’s possible.
Explore the future here https://evenrealities.bio/0kx


Chapters:

00:00 Neuromuscular + Exoskeleton Aim Assist

00:44 Upgrades Needed

02:00 Neuromuscular Aim Assist 2.0

04:50 Exoskeleton Aim Assist 2.0

06:35 Cyborg Upgrade

09:26 Complete Setup & Execution 

14:00 Conclusion/Final thoughts 

15:10 Origin Story (it took 25 minutes to put this thing on and off it was nuts) 

Unedited clip of the final test
https://youtu.be/O1r2G6b0clk


Even G2 and R1 features
title: Neuromuscular Cyborg Aim Assist
